mapper.select: SELECT S.STORE_NAME, S.STORE_ID, S.ADDRESS, E.PHONE, E.EMAIL, ENR_NO FROM STORE S JOIN ENROLL E USING(ENR_NO) WHERE S.STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT ENR_NO,STORE_NAME, PHONE, EMAIL, ENROLL_ADD, STATUS FROM ENROLL

SELECT I.INQ_NO,I.INQ_TITLE, TO_CHAR(INQ_DATE, 'YY.MM.DD') "INQ_DATE" , TO_CHAR(ANS_DATE, 'YY.MM.DD') "ANS_DATE" , I.CATEGORY, I.STORE_ID, S.STORE_NAME FROM INQUERY I JOIN STORE S ON(I.STORE_ID=S.STORE_ID)
ORDER BY INQ_NO DESC

SELECT INQ_NO,INQ_TITLE, INQ_QUERY, INQ_ANSWER, CATEGORY, STORE_NAME, TO_CHAR(INQ_DATE, 'YY.MM.DD') "INQ_DATE", TO_CHAR(ANS_DATE, 'YY.MM.DD') "ANS_DATE" FROM INQUERY I JOIN STORE S ON(I.STORE_ID=S.STORE_ID) WHERE INQ_NO = #{inqNo}
